articles.title: Snap acquires AR display provider WaveOptics for 500M USD - DTNEXT
articles.description: Snap which is the parent company of popular social media app Snapchat has acquired augmented reality (AR) display provider WaveOptics, that power its new Spectacles glasses, for more than $500 million, the media reported.
